languages.text: "Какого еще культа?" {n}Женщина сначала кажется обескураженной, но затем на ее губах появляется горькая ухмылка.{/n} "Это вы так наших освободителей окрестили? У вас любой, кто против угнетателей, сразу еретик".
"Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."
languages.original_text: "Какого еще культа?" {n}Женщина сначала кажется обескураженной, но затем на ее губах появляется горькая ухмылка.{/n} "Это вы так наших освободителей окрестили? У вас любой, кто против угнетателей, сразу еретик".

traits.locale_text: "What cult?" {n}At first the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a cultist."
"What cult?" {n}At first the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a cultist."
"What cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a cultist."
"What cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a cultist."
"Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."
"Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."

languages.text: «¿Culto?». {n}Al principio, la mujer parece confusa, pero luego esboza una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «¿Así llamáis a nuestros libertadores? Para vosotros, todos los que se oponen a los opresores son herejes».
languages.original_text: "Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."

traits.locale_text: «¿Culto?». {n}Al principio, la mujer parece confusa, pero luego esboza una sonrisa amarga.{/n} «¿Así llamáis a nuestros libertadores? Para vosotros, todos los que se oponen a los opresores son herejes».

languages.text: 「教団？」{n}女は最初、困惑した表情を浮かべていたが、やがてふっと苦笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「私たちの解放者をそう呼んでるの？あなたにとって、抑制者と戦う人は誰でも異端者なわけね」
languages.original_text: "Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."

traits.locale_text: 「教団？」{n}女は最初、困惑した表情を浮かべていたが、やがてふっと苦笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「私たちの解放者をそう呼んでるの？あなたにとって、抑制者と戦う人は誰でも異端者なわけね」

languages.text: “什么邪教？”{n}女人一开始看起来困惑不已，但随后唇角露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“你们就是这么称呼我们的解放者，是吧？所有反抗压迫者的人，在你们看来都是异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."

traits.locale_text: “什么邪教？”{n}女人一开始看起来困惑不已，但随后唇角露出了苦涩的笑容。{/n}“你们就是这么称呼我们的解放者，是吧？所有反抗压迫者的人，在你们看来都是异端分子。”

languages.text: "Kult? {n}Zunächst sieht die Frau verwirrt aus, doch dann erscheint ein verbittertes Lächeln auf ihren Lippen.{/n} "Nennt Ihr so unsere Befreier? Für Euch ist jeder, der die Unterdrücker bekämpft, ein Ketzer."
languages.original_text: "Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."

traits.locale_text: "Kult? {n}Zunächst sieht die Frau verwirrt aus, doch dann erscheint ein verbittertes Lächeln auf ihren Lippen.{/n} "Nennt Ihr so unsere Befreier? Für Euch ist jeder, der die Unterdrücker bekämpft, ein Ketzer."

languages.text: « Culte ? {n}répète la femme, l'air confus, avant d'afficher un sourire amer.{/n} C'est comme ça que vous appelez nos libérateurs ? J'imagine que pour vous, tous ceux qui luttent contre l'oppresseur sont des hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."

traits.locale_text: « Culte ? {n}répète la femme, l'air confus, avant d'afficher un sourire amer.{/n} C'est comme ça que vous appelez nos libérateurs ? J'imagine que pour vous, tous ceux qui luttent contre l'oppresseur sont des hérétiques. »

languages.text: "Tarikat mı?" {n}İlk başta kadının kafası karışmış gibi görünüyor. Ardından dudaklarında acı bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Kurtarıcılarımızı böyle mi görüyorsunuz? Baskıcılara karşı savaşan herkesi kâfir biliyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "Cult?" {n}At first, the woman looks confused, but then a bitter smirk appears on her lips.{/n} "Is that what you call our liberators? To you, anyone who fights the oppressors is a heretic."
